entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `FromFormAttribute.Name` not respected by `ApiParameterDescription.Name` #43815
  • after parse http2 stream, how to reset #43813
  • Model-only validation not rendered in absence of model-only errors #43808
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, https, mvc #43805
  • Question - Blazor - Not all unhandled exceptions lead to developer stack trace page. #43804
  • Question - Blazor - Why is a rethrown exception not causing the developer exception stack trace page to be shown? #43800
  • Question - Blazor - Best way to narrowly scope ErrorBoundary #43798
  • How to handle route values in IApplicationModelConvention #43797
  • Accepts Extension method for null Content-Type in Minimal API #43794
  • Cannot get endpoint metadata from `IApiDescriptionGroupCollectionProvider` which added by `MapXXX().Add(...)` #43792
  • OutputCaching + YARP interoperability #43791
  • Hosting bundle gets updated with OS upgrades causing issue. #43790

Closed

  • Multiple ASP.NET Core OAuth Correlation cookies #42740
  • When I install the ASP Core as windows service I can't connect to my gRPC service #43547
  • Make RateLimiterMiddleware endpoint-aware #41667
    7.0.0
  • After changing some code in Counter.razor, then click "Hot Reload" button, the Counter button on the home page will disappear. #41110
    7.0.0
  • Kestrel doesn't allow extra spaces between the http url and version #43705
    6.0.10
  • [Blazor Wasm AD B2C] Authentication OnLogInSucceeded event fired multiple times. #40177
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Issue when setting date value on InputDate component when bound to non class object #34163
    Backlog
  • Support not starting the SPA dev server when launching the backend #43795
  • Dotnet new react template using function components #43770
  • StaticFiles assets not found in ASP.NET Core MVC With RCL #43796
  • [Blazor] @onkeydown:preventDefault not working on Android browsers #42836
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [7.0] Disable body streams for H2 CONNECT requests #43814
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Backport LF line terminator support in HttpParser #43812
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Default install Playwright to false #43811
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Add a JS initializer for the Blazor custom elements package #43809
    area-blazor
  • Update json-schema to 0.4.0 #43807
    area-signalr, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Backport localizations for UseProgramMain string #43803
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #43802
    area-infrastructure
  • Update EF Submodule #43801
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.38
  • feat: use the value of the variable directly #43793
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update fabricbot.json #43806
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Cleanup and tests around gRPC transcoding error handling #43745
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Avoid client result invocation ID collisions #43716
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Add default error response to gRPC transcoding #43768
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • [7.0-rc2] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704 #43706
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [6.0] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.10
  • [release/7.0] Fix auth exception stopping QUIC connection listener #43730
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix summary formatting #43711
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable fast publishing #43788
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43545
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Serialize output caching entries to binary #43672
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 7.0-rc2
  • Remove tagged keys as entries are evicted #43728
    area-runtime, ask-mode, feature-output-caching, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Fix Typos #42612
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix non-shared framework packages referencing transport package #43784
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-rc2
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Add framework to gRPC template's dotnetcli.host.json #43746
    area-mvc, area-grpc
  • [release/7.0] Add query parameters to gRPC transcoding OpenAPI #43751
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1986473 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Update dotnet-getdocument to support minimal APIs #43701
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Fix NavigationLock prerendering #43785
    area-blazor
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43783
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
